channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 新的研究显示，随着房屋和股票价值的飙升，典型的美国老年人的财富在大流行病期间攀升了约 91,000 美元
item.description:
The wealth of the typical US senior climbed by about $91,000 during the pandemic years as home and stock values soared, new research shows https://t.co/5dZK5qFsfp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: B2B 业务量持续低迷，DHL 对经济前景持谨慎态度
item.description:
DHL offers a cautious economic outlook as B2B volumes remain sluggish https://t.co/SDeItcJzaW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 黄金和比特币昨天都创下了历史新高。这两种货币都被其拥趸视为货币的终极形式，然而推动其上涨的动力却似乎大相径庭。这是怎么回事呢？
item.description:
Gold and Bitcoin both hit fresh record highs yesterday. Both are viewed as the ultimate forms of money by their fans, and yet the driving forces pushing each of them higher appear to be very different. What's going on? https://t.co/idklSEzoXE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚政府将对休带薪育儿假的工人的养老金缴费做出期待已久的调整
item.description:
The Australian government will make long-awaited changes to pay pension contributions for workers who take paid parental leave https://t.co/sEankoiH9t

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 通用电气的能源业务明年将产生多达 18 亿美元的自由现金流，这对于等待这家传奇企业集团解体的投资者来说是一个至关重要的衡量标准
item.description:
General Electric’s energy businesses should generate as much as $1.8 billion in free cash flow next year, a critical measure for investors awaiting a breakup of the storied conglomerate https://t.co/VyJrGocl7U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 就预算游戏而言，我们现在差不多到了......还有时间玩👀。
item.description:
In budget game terms, we're now about here... there's still time to play👀https://t.co/yVzXVsZP8J pic.twitter.com/4EB7w1fSQu

— Joe Mayes (@Joe_Mayes) March 6, 2024

item.title: 土耳其央行在本月地方选举前加强对疲软里拉的控制
item.description:
Turkey’s central bank is tightening its grip on the weakening lira before this month’s local elections https://t.co/YWm1dnJzYI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: #5件事 出人意料的 "超级星期二" 喜忧参半 鲍威尔前往国会山 开放式人工智能反击
item.description:
#5Things Unsurprising Super Tuesday Mixed messages Powell heads to Capitol Hill Open AI hits back https://t.co/HJPoE88ia9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 由于通胀前景恶化，乌干达央行在紧急政策会议上提高利率，以提振乌干达先令
item.description:
Ugandan central bank lifts its interest rate at an emergency policy meeting because of a worsening inflation outlook and to boost its shilling https://t.co/RD4lT5xJeK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 印度央行行长 Shaktikanta Das 表示，印度经济的增长速度可能会超过政府的预测，在截至 3 月份的财政年度中将达到接近 8%的增长率。
item.description:
India’s economy will likely grow faster than the government is predicting, reaching close to 8% in the fiscal year through March, central bank Governor Shaktikanta Das says https://t.co/tWvARWQIn1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 礼来公司的减肥药和糖尿病药物正受到美国未决立法的威胁
item.description:
Lilly's weight loss and diabetes drugs are coming under threat by legislation pending in the US https://t.co/bV1TB1lWze

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 荷兰政府动员起来阻止 ASML 向海外扩张
item.description:
Dutch Government Mobilizes to Stop ASML From Expanding Abroad https://t.co/cgkNd2Yp0d

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国证券监管机构誓言打造一支 "监管铁军"，打击市场操纵者；中国人民银行行长认为仍有进一步放松银根的空间。
item.description:
China’s Securities Regulator vows to build a “”regulatory steel army” to crack down on market manipulators, and PBOC Governor sees room for more monetary easing. pic.twitter.com/P3UQLRZHGr

— Stephen Engle (@EngleTV) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一本价值 850 美元的茶几式新书纪念 NFT 的短暂崛起
item.description:
A new $850 coffee-table book commemorates the brief rise of NFTs https://t.co/fMAWApKfsB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 今天上午，当我们等待亨特的到来时，不妨穿上财政大臣的鞋子，玩一玩@乔治-奥斯本（George_Osborne）和@edballs在他们的播客中推荐的@乔-梅耶斯（Joe_Mayes）的精彩预算游戏>>。
item.description:
As we wait for Hunt this morning, step into the chancellor’s shoes and play @Joe_Mayes’ brilliant budget game as recommended by @George_Osborne @edballs on their podcast >>https://t.co/HOEvLpflYT

— Alex Wickham (@alexwickham) March 6, 2024

item.title: 肯尼亚议员将投票决定是否继续实施债务换自然和债务换食品安全计划
item.description:
Kenya lawmakers will vote on whether to pursue plans to implement debt-for-nature and debt-for-food security plans https://t.co/c8ybVOHMQW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在针对注重成本的中国消费者调整产品阵容并降低价格后，该公司报告收入增长 3.6%，好于预期
item.description:
https://t.co/5NY8mE5jTb reports a better-than-expected 3.6% rise in revenue after adjusting its product lineup and cutting prices to target cost-conscious Chinese consumers https://t.co/kXHVZY0tWj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国证券监管机构表示，将在极端情况下采取行动解决 "市场失灵 "问题，并就何时采取行动遏制全球第二大股票市场的动荡做出了迄今为止最详细的承诺
item.description:
China’s securities regulator says it will move to fix “market failures” in extreme cases, giving its most detailed pledge yet on when it acts to contain turmoil in the world’s second-largest stock market https://t.co/meqde0CXwA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，日本央行官员对工资增长的力度越来越有信心，这一进展支持了交易员和经济学家的观点，即日本央行将在 3 月或 4 月取消负利率。
item.description:
Bank of Japan officials are getting more confident over the strength of wage growth, sources say, a development that supports the view among traders and economists that the BOJ will scrap its negative interest rate in March or April https://t.co/qz6Q7qc8WR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 安全初创公司 RapidSOS 获贝莱德 1.5 亿美元融资总部位于纽约的初创公司利用人工智能帮助应急团队更好地装备。创始人迈克尔-马丁（Michael Martin）表示，他希望打造 "911 电话的人工智能驾驶员"。
item.description:
Safety startup RapidSOS raises fm BlackRock to close $150M funding round
NY-based startup uses AI to help emergency response teams be better equipped. Founder Michael Martin says he wants to build "AI Copilot for 911 calls"
via @business @technology https://t.co/mR7kocshGB#AI pic.twitter.com/83aFs17ezW

— Saritha Rai (@SarithaRai) March 6, 2024

item.title: 科威特投资局管理着 8000 多亿美元的政府资金，将迎来有史以来最好的财政年度之一
item.description:
The Kuwait Investment Authority, which manages more than $800 billion in government funds, is poised for one of its best fiscal years on record https://t.co/e3TrCDK9lm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 较小的加密货币开始超越创纪录的比特币，交易商押注这些代币下一步将测试历史峰值
item.description:
Smaller cryptocurrencies are starting to pull ahead of record-setting Bitcoin as traders bet the tokens are next in line to test all-time peaks https://t.co/2oaVprtgtE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 今天是英国预算日！今年是大选年！以下是通过 @BloombergTV 提供的预览，您还可以阅读 @Joe_Mayes 和 @alexwickham 提供的更多信息：
item.description:
It's UK Budget day! And it's an election year! So expect the Chancellor's fiscal statement to be distinctly political with tax cuts front and centre.

Here's a preview, via @BloombergTV

And you can read more from @Joe_Mayes & @alexwickham: https://t.co/HUSC9iL1Tu https://t.co/kEmq8SAvNK

— Lizzy Burden (@lizzzburden) March 6, 2024

item.title: 雷内-本科（Rene Benko）濒临破产的房地产集团 Signa 即将把慕尼黑市中心的一栋大楼出售给德国建筑业大亨阿方斯-多布林格（Alfons Doblinger）。
item.description:
Rene Benko’s ailing property group Signa is close to selling a building in downtown Munich to German construction tycoon Alfons Doblinger https://t.co/v6vubDxCVv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 与许多同行相比，韩国股票的价值被低估了。现在，政府正试图通过让公司董事会对股东更加负责来解决 "韩国折扣 "问题
item.description:
South Korean stocks are undervalued compared to many of their peers. Now the government is trying to fix the "Korea Discount" by making company boards more accountable to shareholders https://t.co/HQphLNY7lh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 超级星期二 "共和党初选的结果消除了人们对 "罗纳德-里根的政党现在完全变成了唐纳德-特朗普的政党 "的疑虑。
item.description:
The results of the Super Tuesday Republican primaries erased any lingering doubts that party of Ronald Reagan is now fully and wholly the party of Donald Trump https://t.co/XZW0KGPTl1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 南非铂金生产商陷入危机，金属价格下滑迫使他们裁员并侵蚀利润
item.description:
South Africa’s platinum producers are in crisis, as slumping metal prices force jobs cuts and erode profits https://t.co/PtgQ68JYrj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉位于柏林附近的工厂在附近一座电塔发生疑似纵火事件一天后仍未重新开工
item.description:
Tesla’s factory near Berlin has yet to reopen, one day after a suspected arson on a nearby electricity tower https://t.co/yPEi4DJyyH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 总部位于阿布扎比的阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）报告利润增长五倍，原因是该公司扩大了航线网络，以满足日益增长的旅行需求。
item.description:
Etihad Airways reports a five fold increase in profit as the Abu Dhabi-based carrier expands its network to tap growing demand for travel https://t.co/ZeT91OfSKe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 当英国财政大臣准备将减税作为其预算的核心时，所有人都在关注杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt），同时也在关注迫在眉睫的大选@lizzzburden 列出了我们的预期：
item.description:
It's all eyes on Jeremy Hunt — and one eye on the looming election — as the UK chancellor prepares to put tax cuts at the centre of his budget@lizzzburden lays out what we're expecting: https://t.co/iqojOcjruH pic.twitter.com/uq4CHfPNGS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024
